Postcode

G77

G77 5

G77 5PU is located in the Newton Mearns South and Eaglesham electoral ward, within the council area of East Renfrewshire and the Scottish Parliamentary constituency of East Renfrewshire. The Community Health Partnership is East Renfrewshire Community Health & Care Partnership and the police force is Scotland. This postcode has been in use since January 1980.
